episodes.title: Densetsu Fukkatsu! Kyros Konshin no Ichigeki
episodes.plot: As an unconscious Sugar falls to the ground, the toys in Dressrosa begin reverting to their human forms, to the shock of the humans around them. Meanwhile, Kyros, finishes what he started 10 years ago by cutting off Doflamingo's head.

episodes.title: Kaken Sakuretsu! Fukkatsu Meramera no Mi no Chikara
episodes.plot: The final Colosseum round continues as Rebecca finally remembers her father. Sabo destroys the Colosseum with his Dragon Claw Fists before leaping at the Fighting Fish bearing the Mera Mera no Mi.

episodes.title: Sassou Toujou: Kakumeigun Sanbou Souchou Sabo!
episodes.plot: The mysterious 'Lucy' finally reveals his identity, while chaos continues at the trade port and in all of Dressrosa.

episodes.title: Akuma no Wana: Dressrosa Senmetsu Sakusen
episodes.plot: Doflamingo unleashes his Birdcage, sealing the entire island in strings. The strings then latch onto people and take control of them, forcing them to attack each other.

episodes.title: Go-oku no Otoko: Nerawareta Usoland!
episodes.plot: As citizens and Marines are forced to attack each other in the streets of Dressrosa, Doflamingo reveals to the island a hit list on the Straw Hat Pirates and their allies.

episodes.title: Tekijin Toppa: Luffy Zoro Hangeki Kaishi
episodes.plot: Sabo and Koala separate from Nico Robin's group and head in separate directions as Robin decides to move toward the palace.

episodes.title: Daichi Meidou: Hakai Kami Kyoudai Pica Kourin
episodes.plot: Luffy and Zoro face off against Fujitora to get to Doflamingo. At the palace, Pica wishes to take the enemies out alone, but his high-pitched voice causes some of the subordinates to giggle, resulting in their deaths.

episodes.title: Daishuuketsu! Luffy to Kyouaku Senshi Gundan
episodes.plot: Luffy and Law survive Pica's punch and are found by the fighters from the Colosseum. They all fight over who will kill Doflamingo and then join up together to begin the fight against Pica.

episodes.title: Kaishingeki! Luffy Gundan vs Pica!
episodes.plot: After destroying Pica's arm, Chinjao and Elizabello II along with other Colosseum fighters proceed to decimate Doflamingo's soldiers.

episodes.title: Shougeki Kokuhaku! Law Atsuki Tamashii no Chikai!
episodes.plot: Law reveals what happened 13 years ago. Robin's group reaches Viola and Doldo's location and plan their next plan.

episodes.title: Daigekitotsu! Sanbou Souchou Sabo vs Taishou Fujitora
episodes.plot: Luffy's group reaches the first level of the castle while the Marines and Fujitora are held off by Sabo who easily overwhelms Vice Admiral Bastille.

episodes.title: Zettaizetsumei: Wana ni Kakatta Luffy!
episodes.plot: At the plateau, Bartolomeo, Robin and Rebecca continue travelling to the flower field with the aid of Leo's beetles. Back in the tunnel, Luffy and Law get caught in a trap.

episodes.title: Daidasshutsu! Luffy Kishikaisei no Elephant Gun
episodes.plot: Doflamingo's ambush for Luffy and Law is cut short when he is skewered by Abdullah and Jeet only to be exposed as another string clone. The two captains then learn how Kelly Funk betrayed them only to be betrayed by Doflamingo in return.

episodes.title: Kyoudousensen: Luffy Shouri e no Toppakou
episodes.plot: The Colosseum fighters are struggling against the elite officers while Cavendish offers Luffy and Law a ride to the palace. Kyros joins Luffy's party, and they arrive at the battle taking place in the palace's plateau.

episodes.title: Futarime no Samurai: Yuudachi Kanjuurou Toujou
episodes.plot: At the new palace tower, the Colosseum fighters are still clashing with the Donquixote Pirates allowing Luffy, Law, Kyros and Cavendish to escape towards the third level in order to reach level four.

episodes.title: Funtou to no Pica: Zoro Ichi Todome no Ichigeki
episodes.plot: Zoro continues his duel with Pica allowing Robin's group to advance. At the SMILE factory, the dwarf army continues their revolt.

episodes.title: Kobito no Hime: Toraware no Mansherry
episodes.plot: Having fooled Senor Pink, Franky arrives at the SMILE factory. Kin'emon and Kanjuro arrive at Viola's location.

episodes.title: Fujimi! Kyoufu no Atamawari Ningyou Gundan
episodes.plot: Viola discovers Mansherry's whereabouts and sends the info to Leo. Meanwhile, Luffy's group fight against the giant nutcrackers.

episodes.title: Inochi Kakete! Luffy wa Shouri no Kirifuda
episodes.plot: Rebecca reaches the flower field. Leo and Kabu leave to rescue Mansherry. Sabo continues his fight with Fujitora.

episodes.title: Namida no Saikai: Rebecca to Kyros
episodes.plot: Luffy and Law reach the flower field and continue towards the palace. However, Sugar is heading for them, eager to turn the two into toys and gain revenge.

episodes.title: Ichigeki Hissatsu: Dressrosa o Sukuu Otoko
episodes.plot: Usopp, with the help of Violet, aims at Sugar intending to take her down before she turns Luffy and Law into toys.

episodes.title: Ikari Bakuhatsu: Luffy Law Saikyou no Hisaku
episodes.plot: The battle between Robin's group and the nutcracker army comes to a stop as the toys revert into their human selves due to Sugar being knocked unconscious again. Luffy and Law begin their fight with Doflamingo.

episodes.title: Kedakaki Ichizoku! Doflamingo no Shoutai!
episodes.plot: Doflamingo recovers from Luffy's Red Hawk and continues his fight with him and Law. Sabo and Fujitora end their fight, calling it a draw.

episodes.title: Kyuukyoku no Chikara: Op-Op no Jitsu no Himitsu!
episodes.plot: The Marines are having difficulty maintaining order in the streets of Dressrosa as they deal with rampaging animals and pillaging pirates as well as the absence of Admiral Fujitora.

episodes.title: Kanashiki Kioku: Shiroi Machi no Shounen Law!
episodes.plot: The history of Flevance is revealed as Law's history prior to joining the Donquixote Pirates is explored.

episodes.title: Tenryuubito! Doffy no Souzetsu Naru Kako
episodes.plot: Doflamingo has a nightmare of his traumatic past. A flashback details the moment his parents left Mary Geoise, to when they became hunted and the death of Doflamingo and Rosinante's mother.

episodes.title: Kunan no Michi: Law to Corazon Inochi no Tabi
episodes.plot: Corazon talks to Law about the name "D." and states that they are considered troublesome by most. He also tells Law about his ulterior motives without exposing his relation to the marines.

episodes.title: Toki Sameru! Op-Op no Mi o Ubae!
episodes.plot: Donquixote Rosinante learns of his brother's intentions of stealing the Ope Ope no Mi and having him eat it. He resolves to steal it himself in order to have Trafalgar Law cured.

episodes.title: Kakugo no Toki: Corazon Wakare no Egao!
episodes.plot: Corazon force-feeds Law the Ope Ope no Mi and has him deliver an important message to the Marines, but Law mistakenly gives the message to Vergo who informs Doflamingo of his treachery.

episodes.title: Yuke Law: Yasashiki Otoko Saigo no Tatakai!
episodes.plot: After recalling how he killed his father and met his executives as a child, Donquixote Doflamingo confronts his brother, Rosinante.

episodes.title: Jiyuu e! Law Injection Shot Sakuretsu
episodes.plot: Law clashes with Doflamingo, taunting him about the "D". Meanwhile, Luffy struggles against Doflamingo's Black Knight clone and a controlled Bellamy.

episodes.title: Atsuki Tatakai: Law vs Doflamingo
episodes.plot: Zoro and Pica continue their fight with Pica getting larger. Meanwhile, Doflamingo cuts of Law's arm as Luffy finally defeats the clone.

episodes.title: Kanbu Kessen: Hokori Takaki Hajrudin
episodes.plot: The Colosseum combatants then manage to gain the upper hand, starting with Machvise being defeated by Hajrudin.

episodes.title: Ai no Kessen: Shintouryou Sai tai Baby 5
episodes.plot: Monkey D. Luffy and Bellamy continue their confrontation. Meanwhile, Lao G defeats Chinjao, but Sai, now officially the head of the Happo Navy, defeats Lao G with the technique he inherited from his grandfather.

episodes.title: Otoko no Iji: Bellamy Saigo no Totsugeki!
episodes.plot: Donquixote Doflamingo and Trebol defeat Law while Gladius attacks Cavendish. Luffy tries to convince Bellamy to stop attacking him.

episodes.title: Shippuudotou: Hakuba tai Dellinger
episodes.plot: Cavendish survives Gladius's Punk Rock Fest. Gladius is knocked out by Bartolomeo's Barrier Bulls. Dellinger defeats Ideo but is in turn defeated by Hakuba, who proceeds to attack Nico Robin.

episodes.title: Baribari: Homage Shinken Hatsudou!
episodes.plot: Gladius attempts to blow up both Nico Robin and Cavendish by rupturing the cliff-side they are on, but Cavendish manages to carry Robin to safety using Hakuba's speed.

episodes.title: Iyashi no Hime: Mansherry o Sukue!
episodes.plot: Giolla attempts to heal the fallen Donquixote Pirates executives with Mansherry's healing powers, but Leo defeats her while saving the princess. Meanwhile, Luffy continues to fight Bellamy.

episodes.title: Otoko no Kettou: Senor Ai no Banka
episodes.plot: Leo, Mansherry, and Kabu escape the palace as Giolla fails to inform Doflamingo of Mansherry's rescue.

episodes.title: Shi no Hoshikuzu: Diamante Moukou no Arashi
episodes.plot: Senor Pink is defeated by Franky, who leads the dwarf army to attack the SMILE Factory before collapsing. Meanwhile, Kyros battles Diamante and endures his Death Enjambre.

episodes.title: Trueno Bastardo: Kyros Ikari no Ichigeki
episodes.plot: Kyros continues his grueling battle with Diamante before finally defeating him. As the citizens celebrate, Pica abandons his fight with Roronoa Zoro to confront Kyros.

episodes.title: Daichi Oudan: Kyozou Pica Kishuu Sakusen!
episodes.plot: As Luffy continues to fight Bellamy, Pica advances toward the King's Plateau in his giant stone body in an attempt to kill King Riku, forcing Roronoa Zoro to come up with a plan to stop him.

episodes.title: Kuuchuu Kessen: Zoro Shin Hissastsu Ougi Sakuretsu!
episodes.plot: Pica reaches and attacks the King's Plateau, but Roronoa Zoro slashes apart his stone body and cuts him down with Sanzen Sekai.

episodes.title: Abayo! Bellamy Wakare no Ichigeki!
episodes.plot: Mansherry meets Kyros, who tells her to use her healing powers on those who need it more than he does. The SMILE Factory is destroyed by the dwarf army, and Sabo prepares to meet Luffy at the palace.

episodes.title: Law Shisu: Luffy Fundo no Moukougeki!
episodes.plot: Riku gathers more people to help the citizens, Luffy makes it back to the rooftop, where he attacks Doflamingo.

episodes.title: Shuunen no Yaiba: Gyakushuu no Gamma Knife!
episodes.plot: Doflamingo shrinks the Birdcage, causing the citizens of Dressrosa to run away in panic. Luffy fights Doflamingo, but Law switches places with him in order to land his Gamma Knife attack.

episodes.title: Haki Gekitotsu: Luffy tai Doflamingo
episodes.plot: Doflamingo uses his powers to heal himself and attack Law. Luffy stops Doflamingo, and the two clash using Haoshoku Haki. During the battle, Trebol remembers how he found a young Doflamingo and gave him the power to kill anyone he wanted.

episodes.title: Kougeki Funou: Trebol Shougeki no Himitsu
episodes.plot: Trebol immobilizes Luffy and Law and explains how he and the other three Donquixote executives found Doflamingo and raised him into the man he is today. Law mocks Trebol, causing the executive to attack him in anger.
